message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at $135? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $135. How about we try $125?
I'm still not willing to go below $135, but I'm willing to give you a slight discount. How about we try $132? I'm trying to find a middle ground here.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still a bit higher than $132. How about we try $128?
I'm still not willing to go below $135, but I'm willing to give you a small discount. How about we try $130? I'm trying to find a middle ground here.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still a bit higher than $130. How about we try $127?
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $131? I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I understand you're frustrated, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $129, but that's as low as I can go.
